_description_zh: 高頻剝頭皮情境 - 警示範例
_purpose: Demonstrates the 'event horizon' effect with very tight stops

notes: 成本密度 2.2 pips = 佣金等效 0.70 + 點差 1.50
警告：停損 3.0 < 臨界值 3.7，處於高摩擦區

_analysis.interpretation: With P=3 pips (below P_critical=3.67), more than half of the theoretical edge is consumed by costs. Win rate requirement jumps from 25% to 43%.
_analysis.interpretation_zh: 在 P=3 pips（低於 P_critical=3.67）時，超過一半的理論優勢被成本吞噬。勝率需求從 25% 跳升至 43%。

scissors_effect.description: At this timeframe, not only are costs higher (56% loss), but signal quality is also degraded due to noise
scissors_effect.description_zh: 在此時間框架下，不僅成本更高（損失 56%），訊號品質也因雜訊而下降

_analysis.recommendation: Increase P to at least 5.5 pips (1.5x P_critical) or find lower-cost execution
_analysis.recommendation_zh: 建議將 P 增加至至少 5.5 pips（1.5 倍 P_critical）或尋找更低成本的執行方式
